title: [QUESTION] Is this library compatible with Xamarin HotRestart (iOS)?
body:
I'm using this package in a Xamarin.Forms project tageting iOS.

I have a native crash on startup, running on a local device.
I'm afraid it is because of a [limitation](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/xamarin/xamarin-forms/deploy-test/hot-restart#limitations) around static libraries comming with this package.

Can you confirm?

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body: Are you using HarfBuzz or just SkiaSharp. SkiaSharp should be working just fine as it is a dynamic framework.

comments.author: omatrot
comments.body: I'm just using SkiaSharp. Thanks for your answer.
